description: Xamarin bindings to the native Android Agora.io Full SDK.
releaseNotes:
v2.2.0 (Released May 4th, 2018)
New Functions
1. Play the audio effect in the channel
Added a publish parameter in the playEffect method, to enable the remote user in the channel to hear the audio effect played locally. For details, see the description for playEffect in Video Call API.

Note

If your SDK is upgraded to v2.2 from a previous version, pay attention to the function changes of this API.

2. Deploy the proxy at the server
Agora provides a proxy package for enterprise users with corporate firewalls to deploy before accessing the services of Agora. For details, see Advanced: Deploying the Enterprise Proxy.

3. Get the remote video state
Added the remoteVideoStateChangedOfUid method to get the state of the remote video stream. For details, see the description for remoteVideoStateChangedOfUid in Video Call API.

4. Add watermarks on the broadcasting video
Added the watermark function enabling users to add a PNG file to the local or CDN broadcast as a watermark. Added the addVideoWatermark and clearVideoWatermarks APIs to add and delete watermarks in a local live broadcast. The watermark parameter in the LiveTranscording interface enables watermarks in CDN broadcasts. For details, see the descriptions for addVideoWatermark, clearVideoWatermarks, and LiveTranscoding in Interactive Broadcast API.

Improvements
1. Audio volume indication
Improved the enableAudioVolumeIndication function. The method, once enabled, sends the audio volume indication of the speaker in its callback at set intervals, regardless of whether any user is speaking in the channel.

2. Network quality detection during a session
To meet the customers’ need for real-time network quality detection in the channel, the onNetworkQuality method improved its data accuracy. For details, see the description for onNetworkQuality in Video Call API.

3. Lastmile quality detection before joining a channel
To test if the customers’ network condition can support voice or video calls before joining the channel, onLastmileQuality changed the detection from a fixed bitrate to the bitrate set by the customer in setVideoProfile to improve data accuracy. When the network condition is unknown, this callback is still triggered at a two second intervals. For details, see the description for onLastmileQuality in Video Call API.

4. Audio Quality Enhancement
Improved the audio quality in music playback scenarios.

Issues Fixed
Fixed occasional screen display abnormalities when a large number of audience joins a host in a live-broadcast channel.
Fixed occasional CDN streaming abnormalities when background apps are running during a live broadcast.

origin: https://docs.agora.io/en/2.2/product/Video/Product%20Overview/release_android_video
summary: Xamarin Agora Full Android SDK lets you use Agora.in-powered video sessions in apps
title: Xamarin bindings to the native Android Agora Video SDK
